review: I have both the Fire TV Stick and the Fire TV.  I got both the week they came out and actually enjoy using them both.I can say the Fire TV stick for me has been just as good as the Fire TV for streaming both TV ( I don't play games on these devices)The ONLY thing I like about the Fire TV vs. the Fire TV stick is that the Fire TV has an Ethernet port.  I have good wifi coverage in my home but I always prefer wired when possible.
